title: studio
description: A json file representing a studio. The file is named by a MD5 Code.

image.description: Logo of the studio, parsed into base64

created_at.description: The time this studios data was added to the database. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD

updated_at.description: The time this studios data was last changed in the database. Format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD
